lore: {"text":"The Minotaur is a rare mob in the Mythological","color":"gray"}
{"text":"Ritual. It will attack at melee range, and can","color":"gray"}
{"text":"throw an axe at you, temporarily slowing down","color":"gray"}
{"text":"your healing speed. It has a special mechanic","color":"gray"}
{"text":"called Bleed that allows it to do more damage.","color":"gray"}
{"text":"It increases by 1 every time it hits you, and","color":"gray"}
{"text":"increases by 3 every time its axe hits you.","color":"gray"}
